project1.title: News Homepage
project1.description: A clean and modern news website layout. It has a featured article section, a list of the latest news, and smooth hover effects. Fully responsive across mobile, tablet, and desktop screens.

project2.title: E-commerce Shop Homepage
project2.description: A simple and interactive product page for an online store. It includes an image gallery with a lightbox, product details, and a shopping cart feature. Fully responsive and user-friendly.

project3.title: Single Page Portfolio
project3.description: A personal portfolio page to showcase projects and skills. Clean layout with smooth scrolling and responsive design, making it easy to view on any device.

project4.title: Room Brand Landing Page
project4.description: A stylish landing page for a furniture brand. It features a modern layout with hero images, product highlights, and smooth navigation. Fully responsive for all screen sizes.
